resources.string: The user\'s phone number is unknown

In order to be able to \"do something\", the app needs to verify your phone number by sending an SMS message to your phone and then read that same received SMS message, so the app may request the required permissions
Phone numbers do not match. Please try again.
Verification message from %1$s app to %2$s. Code: %3$s
Phone number has already been verified
A previous verification process is still ongoing, please wait a few seconds
Generic failure when sending the SMS
Unable to send SMS, no network service
Unable to send SMS, PDU error
Unable to send SMS, all radio signals are off. Airplane mode?
